This table uses the product classification of the Supply-Use tables. The Supply-Use tables are built around three classification systems: the Input-Output Industry Classification (IOIC), the Supply-Use Product Classification (SUPC) and the Input-Output Final Demand Classification (IOFDC). The Supply-Use Product Classification (SUPC) is based on the North American Product Classification System (NAPCS).
